6d194384-fa8a-4e00-8215-ca0321ade6ab.description: The o9 IBP Platform Functional Associate Badge confirms the individual can demonstrate how o9 IBP relates to the Supply Chain Planning domain. The individual can identify the key functional uses for the three o9 User Interfaces: Web UI, Excel UI and the Mobile UI. Additionally, the individual can demonstrate how the o9 Platform can be used for different planning roles such as Demand Planner, Supply Planner, and S&OP Planner.
6d194384-fa8a-4e00-8215-ca0321ade6ab.name: o9 IBP Platform - Functional Associate

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was successfully able to complete the o9 Platform - Functional Overview Certification Program.

87798f01-9f08-46d7-bf02-3bdb01743d5c.description: Ownership of the Enterprise Modeler Configuration Associate Badge confirms the individual can create, construct, and modify an Enterprise Planning Model using the o9 Platform. The earner can build hierarchical or non-hierarchical models to process the business data and apply rules. Additionally, the earner can configure dashboards, comprising of different kinds of widgets; and implement access controls enabling appropriate data visualization thereby driving improved analytics.
87798f01-9f08-46d7-bf02-3bdb01743d5c.name: Enterprise Modeler Configuration Associate

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was successfully able to complete o9 Platform Technical Configuration - Level I Learning Program on o9 Academy

ebae3146-9d03-41cd-86fb-bcc381d1f9ea.description: The primary goal of the Supply Chain Solver (SCS) is to make a demand supply match by adhering to the business priorities/rules such as Demand/Customer Priorities, Inventory Policies, and Demand Fulfilment. The badge earner is knowledgeable to meet this primary goal and knows how to use the Supply Chain Solver to execute the most efficient plan.
ebae3146-9d03-41cd-86fb-bcc381d1f9ea.name: o9 Supply Chain Solver - Associate

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was successfully able to complete the Beginner’s Guide to Supply Chain Solver (SCS) Learning Program.

3921475e-b23c-4b63-984d-8f62bece126a.description: Owning Enterprise Modeler Configuration Professional Badge confirms the individual can identify and perform tasks from the business logic aspect of a model. This includes creating plugins using JavaScript and Web API connections, Python, and R. The earner can work with more scope types, configure more action buttons, use edges and measures in a GRAPH model, and use the config management tool and model library to manage components of a model.
3921475e-b23c-4b63-984d-8f62bece126a.name: Enterprise Modeler Configuration Professional

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has successfully completed the o9 Platform Technical Configuration - Level II Learning Program on o9 Academy

skills.name: Creating Procedures To Execute Business Rules

531bea26-c301-4a4d-87e4-2bd5e8ed904b.description: The o9 Reference Model Demand Planning - Functional Associate Badge confirms the individual can describe the various processes and workflows that are part of o9's Demand Planning Reference Product. The earner can identify each of the workflows, the roles associated with them, and the functionalities related to the workflows. Additionally, the earner is also skilled in driver-based forecasting, Exceptions and Insights, and Root Cause Analysis that aid in accurate forecast generation.
531bea26-c301-4a4d-87e4-2bd5e8ed904b.name: o9 Reference Model Demand Planning - Functional Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Reference Model - Demand Planning  Certification Program.

fdcc7a6c-0a07-46a4-84d8-dc57481a6b63.description: The o9 Reference Model Demand Planning - Technical Associate Badge confirms the individual can illustrate the various processes, workflows, and roles that are part of o9's Demand Planning Reference Product. The earner can further configure the model and demonstrate their expertise in implementing multiple forecasting algorithms, segmentation, variability analysis, and ML based forecasting, to derive the most accurate demand.
fdcc7a6c-0a07-46a4-84d8-dc57481a6b63.name: o9 Reference Model Demand Planning - Technical Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Reference Model - Demand Planning Certification Program.

72cd6e2e-6c57-4123-845a-736f94587f63.description: This badge confirms that the earner can describe the processes and workflows that are part of o9's Demand Planning Reference Product. The earner can identify the workflows, associated roles, & various functionalities including managing data, Postgame analysis, Forecast generation, & Demand review. The earner can configure the model and implement Rules-based forecasting, Segmentation, variability analysis, New Product forecasting, & ML-based forecasting, to derive the most accurate demand.
72cd6e2e-6c57-4123-845a-736f94587f63.name: R2022 Reference Product Demand Planning - Implementer

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has to pass the Reference Model - Demand Planning (R2022) Implementer Certification Exam and score 70% or above.

80ea7349-3f51-4e02-bf88-65e67ede1b21.description: The o9 Reference Model MEIO - Technical Associate Badge confirms the individual can demonstrate the various processes and workflows that are part of o9's MEIO Reference Product. The earner can configure the model, and demonstrate their expertise by using or customizing each of the workflows, the processes, and the capabilities related to the workflows.
80ea7349-3f51-4e02-bf88-65e67ede1b21.name: o9 Reference Model MEIO - Technical Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has successfully completed the Multi-Echelon Inventory Optimization (MEIO) Certification Program

77a6bdb7-75f9-4d09-8705-78f99a8f74f3.description: The o9 Reference Model MEIO - Functional Associate Badge confirms the individual can describe the various processes and workflows that are part of o9's MEIO Reference Product. The earner can identify each of the workflows, the processes associated with them, and the functionalities related to the workflows. Additionally, the earner is also skilled in formulating strategies that form highly competitive service levels and thereby see a reduction in – or elimination of – stockouts.
77a6bdb7-75f9-4d09-8705-78f99a8f74f3.name: o9 Reference Model MEIO - Functional Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has successfully completed the Multi-Echelon Inventory Optimization (MEIO)  Certification Program.

7e1839b9-0494-401d-9cc8-26952b8a779d.description: Performance Tuning Specialist in IBPL & LS confirms that the individual understands tuning strategies that can be adopted to improve the model's overall performance. The individual has learned the design principles for performance & scalability and can manage performance issues in a project or a model.
7e1839b9-0494-401d-9cc8-26952b8a779d.name: Performance Tuning Specialist in IBPL & LS

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "Profiling & Fine Tuning in IBP & LS" program in the "Performance Improvement Series" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

d0891dc8-90aa-4241-bc52-d06855791f41.description: This badge confirms the individual can demonstrate how sustainability and social impact are part of the DNA at o9. The individual understands the intersection between sustainability and supply chain. The program equips learners with knowledge about the three social impact pillars - engage, educate and transform. The individual has the ability to talk about SDG, ESG practices and many more. The individual can demonstrate knowledge about integration of sustainability metrics into the o9 platform.
d0891dc8-90aa-4241-bc52-d06855791f41.name: o9 Social Impact - Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was successfully able to complete the o9 Sustainability Program online.

4ccac70e-f6cd-4651-b020-ff27cef6ce7b.description: The individual is trained on tuning strategies that can be adopted to improve the model’s overall performance. The individual knows profiling techniques to debug the performance issues & bottlenecks in UI and Fine tuning strategies that can be used to improve performance. While going through this certification program, the individual would have worked on examples and use cases from implementations that had proven results.
4ccac70e-f6cd-4651-b020-ff27cef6ce7b.name: Performance Tuning Specialist in UI

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "Profiling & Fine Tuning in UI" program in the "Performance Improvement Series" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

735331bd-54fc-48a9-9ab8-06ce687e380d.description: This badge confirms the participant can demonstrate how sustainability and social impact are part of the DNA at o9. The participant understands the intersection between sustainability and supply chain. The webinar provides insights about the three social impact pillars - engage, educate and transform. The participant has the ability to talk about SDG, ESG practices and many more. The participant can demonstrate knowledge about the integration of sustainability metrics into the o9 platform.
735331bd-54fc-48a9-9ab8-06ce687e380d.name: o9 Social Impact - Champion

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual has participated in the o9 Social Impact webinar.

be7f5d27-db42-4537-914f-2310f571f94f.description: This Badge confirms that the individual can explain the various processes, workflows, & functionalities that are part of the Supply Planning Reference Product. The earner understands different aspects of Data Management, Plan Inputs, Plan Parameters, & Plan Output analysis, in context to the Reference Product configuration. The earner also knows some elements of the Model configuration & UI, which aids in implementing solutions for various planning scenarios using the Reference Product.
be7f5d27-db42-4537-914f-2310f571f94f.name: R2022 Reference Product Supply Planning - Implementer

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has to complete all units and assessments of the Reference Product Supply Planning R2022.04 Learning Program on o9 Academy.

cfb85eff-d4eb-423e-8bbd-62f0cf4a3763.description: o9 Integration Specialist Badge confirms that the individual can describe the various processes and workflows that are part of the o9's Reference Product Integration. The individual can work with and customize workflow and the process associated with them. Additionally, the individual is skilled to use the various tools and utilities to perform the integration tasks.
cfb85eff-d4eb-423e-8bbd-62f0cf4a3763.name: Integrations Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was able to successfully complete the Integrations Using SSIS & Reference Product Integration R2021.10 Program and pass the corresponding exam.

583308ad-59e9-4f2e-b218-96175a1bb559.description: The individual has a good understanding of performance considerations to be done in a Supply Chain Solver. The individual can handle profiling solver run times for identifying bottlenecks, understanding solver traces and how to optimize solver behavior, and performance tuning parameters in the solver configuration. The individual can also handle performance issues in the SCS plugin and is aware of design considerations in modeling for performance & scalability.
583308ad-59e9-4f2e-b218-96175a1bb559.name: Performance Tuning Specialist in SCS

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "Profiling & Fine Tuning in SCS" program in the "Performance Improvement Series" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

c5be6173-88a2-4f77-bcca-55c48369e62a.description: The o9 GTM - Demo Professional Badge confirms the individual can demonstrate how o9 solutions relate to the Supply Chain Planning domain. The individual can identify and demonstrate the key functional use cases for Demand Planning, Supply Planning, IBP, and Control Tower.
c5be6173-88a2-4f77-bcca-55c48369e62a.name: o9 GTM - Demo Professional

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual was successfully able to attend the instructor-led o9 GTM - Demo Professional Training and complete all the assessments that were part of the training. During the presentation, the individual was able to master the clicks for use cases, highlight key messages, and demonstrated storytelling capabilities.

c673924f-abd3-4f9b-bc82-732504af2f98.description: The o9 Reference Product Control Tower - Functional Associate Badge confirms the individual can explain the various processes and workflows that are part of the Control Tower Reference Product. The earner can identify the workflows related to Control Tower R2020.12 Reference Product. The individual can describe concepts such as Transactional Model, Inventory Rebalancing, Scenario Comparison, and Financial Modeling. The individual can set up PO Alert, STO Alert, and Inventory Alert.
c673924f-abd3-4f9b-bc82-732504af2f98.name: o9 Reference Product Control Tower - Functional Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The owner of this Badge has successfully completed the Control Tower R2020.12 Certification Program.

2c96c98c-65a1-440f-9345-e9a8d1d5343c.description: The o9 Reference Product Control Tower - Technical Associate Badge confirms the individual can explain the various processes and workflows that are part of the Control Tower Reference Product. The earner can identify the workflows related to Control Tower R2020.12 Reference Product. The individual can describe concepts such as Transactional Model, Inventory Rebalancing, Scenario Comparison, and Financial Modeling. The individual can set up PO Alert, STO Alert, and Inventory Alert.
2c96c98c-65a1-440f-9345-e9a8d1d5343c.name: o9 Reference Product Control Tower - Technical Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The owner of this Badge has successfully completed the Control Tower R2020.12 Certification Program.

8a411014-cb61-4ea9-9ad1-e00c4f26c696.description: This Badge confirms that the earner has learned the strategy behind the design of the Supply Planning Reference Product. The earner has understood the data flow, and how to deal with Plan Inputs Data at various levels from the UI screens. The earner knows important Plan Parameters and their impact on the Supply Chain Solver runs. The earner can describe some elements of the Model configuration & UI, which aids in planning solutions for various planning scenarios using the Reference Product.
8a411014-cb61-4ea9-9ad1-e00c4f26c696.name: R2022 Reference Product Supply Planning - Master Planner

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has to complete all units and assessments of the Supply Planning Reference Product R2022 - Master Planner Learning Program on o9 Academy.

b42cf034-4599-4dce-9f36-03a06cbf8eb9.description: This badge confirms the individual can describe o9’s approach to sustainability data management for environmental footprinting. The individual understands the goal of o9’s Sustainability Solutions, the purpose of materiality assessments, the core environmental impact categories, sustainability data classifications & sustainability frameworks embedded in the platform. The individual can demonstrate knowledge about the purpose of integration of sustainability metrics into the o9 platform.
b42cf034-4599-4dce-9f36-03a06cbf8eb9.name: o9 Sustainability Solutions - Environmental Footprint Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "E2E Environmental Footprint Measuring" program in the "o9 Sustainability" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

7e69b788-cf8c-4317-b796-7ff4d1476f36.description: This badge confirms the individual can describe o9’s sustainable strategic planning core capabilities. The individual understands the goal and fundamentals of sustainable strategic planning at o9.
7e69b788-cf8c-4317-b796-7ff4d1476f36.name: o9 Sustainability Solutions - Sustainable Strategic Planning Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "Sustainable Strategic Planning" program in the "o9 Sustainability" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

9013f278-04bb-432c-9b44-52b862ef0ed7.description: This badge confirms the individual can describe o9’s sustainable operational planning core capabilities. The individual understands the fundamentals of sustainable operational planning at o9 & can demonstrate knowledge about integration of sustainability metrics into traditional operational planning on o9 platform. The individual will know the difference between linear & circular economy concepts, carbon pricing, & prescriptive sustainability scenarios optimizing carbon, cost & service levels.
9013f278-04bb-432c-9b44-52b862ef0ed7.name: o9 Sustainability Solutions - Sustainable Operational Planning Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete the "Sustainability Operational Planning, ESG risk, and Circularity" program in the "o9 Sustainability" category and pass all the assessments on the o9 Academy.

2ac2b88a-d938-4352-a12b-a92f51f18b84.description: o9 Data Scientist Badge confirms that the individual can now turn raw data into actionable insights and insights into profitable margins by developing data-driven plans. The individual is now equipped to apply Machine Learning algorithms with Python programming to predict driver-based forecasts more accurately. Additionally, the individual can now optimize Python and PySpark plugins for better performance on the o9 Platform.
2ac2b88a-d938-4352-a12b-a92f51f18b84.name: Data Scientist

badge_template_activities.title: To attain this badge, the individual should complete all the programs in the "Data Science with Python" category and pass all the assessments on o9 Academy.
